TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DedicatedCircuitPeeringRouteTableSummaryOperationsExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The Express Route API provides programmatic access to the functionality needed by the customer to set up Dedicated Circuits and Dedicated Circuit Links. The Express Route Customer API is a REST API. All API operations are performed over SSL and mutually authenticated using X.509 v3 certificates. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/ee460799.aspx for more information)
